description.component: A rich hero slide that display video and/or image.

node.name: Node
node.description: The node entity with limited access to object properties and methods.

author_picture.name: Author Picture
author_picture.description: The node author user entity, rendered using the compact view mode.

url.name: URL
url.description: Direct URL of the current node.

display_submitted.name: Display Submitted
display_submitted.description: Whether submission information should be displayed.

attributes.name: Attributes
attributes.description: HTML attributes for the containing element.

title_attributes.name: Title Attributes
title_attributes.description: Same as attributes, except applied to the main title tag that appears in the template.

content_attributes.name: Content Attributes
content_attributes.description: Same as attributes, except applied to the main content tag that appears in the template.

author_attributes.name: Author Attributes
author_attributes.description: Same as attributes, except applied to the author of the node tag that appears in the template.

title_prefix.name: Title Prefix
title_prefix.description: Additional output populated by modules, intended to be displayed in front of the main title tag that appears in the template.

title_suffix.name: Title Suffix
title_suffix.description: Additional output populated by modules, intended to be displayed after the main title tag that appears in the template.

teaser.name: Teaser
teaser.description: Flag for the teaser state. Will be true if view_mode is 'teaser'.

page.name: Page
page.description: Flag for the full page state. Will be true if view_mode is 'full'.

readmore.name: Read More
readmore.description: Flag for more state. Will be true if the teaser content of the node cannot hold the main body content.

logged_in.name: Logged In
logged_in.description: Flag for authenticated user status. Will be true when the current user is a logged-in member.

is_admin.name: Is Admin
is_admin.description: Flag for admin user status. Will be true when the current user is an administrator.
